title: NBA LIVE 09
description: Game modes include Play Now, Quick Pick Play, All-Star Weekend and the Dynasty Mode™

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: NBA Live 09 Charlotte Bobcats Theme
childDownloads.description: Suit up your Xbox Live Dashboard and show your team spirit with this official NBA Live 09 Theme Pack.  Each Theme Pack comes with four Theme Pics, including: a practice gym, team logo, and arena pic.  Practice your moves in the gym, show off your team's logo, or bring it on your home court.  You have no reason not to download this Theme Pack right now.  It’s nothing but net! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
